channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Local Scumbags, 3rd September
item.description:
You need to put a camera up here because this is becoming a hotspot and most probably by the same person

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Charlton Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped by big bins opp 39 Westbourne gardens, 3rd September
item.description:
A resident of Sunderland Terrace has dumped recycling rubbish next to, and not in, the bins opposite 39 Westbourne Gardens. Why has this resident done this on a Tuesday when the Council does its doorstep collection? Can the council please tell this resident, Edward Wilson of 23A Sunderland Terrace, not to flytip and to use the Council doorstep rubbish collection service instead. He could have just left his rubbish outside his front door, instead of dumping it in the neighbouring street. THE COUNCIL MUST GET LOCAL RESIDENTS TO START USING THE DOORSTEP COLLECTION SERVICE AND STOP THINKING ITS OK TO DUMP THEIR WASTE ON THEIR NEIGHBOURS.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westbourne Gardens, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog Fouling Signs needed along Brooks Way, 3rd September
item.description:
The footpath through Brooks Way to Main Rd needs Dog Fouling signs on the lamposts please . We had these before but they have been broken and taken down and so needs replacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Need Dog Control signs replace on lampposts of Brooks Way, 3rd September
item.description:
There were about 6 Dog Control street signs on the lampost and footbridge railing before and they have all now disappeared so could we have them replaced please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Long term leak & several holes, 3rd September
item.description:
